title: Bose Quietcomfort 45 Bluetooth Wireless Over Ear Headphones with Mic Noise Cancelling - White Smoke
description: NOISE CANCELLING WIRELESS HEADPHONES: The perfect balance of quiet, comfort, and sound. Bose uses tiny mics to measure, compare, and react to outside noise, cancelling it with opposite signals. Bluetooth range-up to 9 m (30 feet).
